item.title: About me
item.description: Hi ðŸ‘‹, I’m Fahad (/fÃ¤hÉ‘Ã°/). GitHub LinkedIn I’m a Software Engineer from Dhaka, Bangladesh. I specialize in creating performant and scalable reactive web apps using React and Node. I’m currently working at Digital Healthcare Solutions (formerly Telenor Health). I’m also in the process of completing my undergrad at AIUB. I enjoy learning about new technology (languages/frameworks/libraries/syntax…) and I’m usually willing to pay the early-adopter tax if I think the tech is awesome.
